author: S Prasad
text:
Student volunteers from various colleges have been designated as ambassadors of the Elections department to create awareness among the electorate on the importance of voting in the Assembly elections, said District Election Officer and Collector S. Sundaravadivelu.

Speaking at an awareness programme organised by the Elections department at Gandhi Thidal here on Friday, Mr. S. Sundaravadivelu said that the student volunteers would conduct a door-to-door campaign and create awareness among voters on the importance of voting.

The Election department will also distribute publicity materials such as handbills and posters.
title: Students in UT to go on door-to-door campaign
